beers.description: Our Farmhouse Double IPA double dry hopped with Mosaic and conditioned on dried blueberries and hibiscus. 8.0%
beers.summary: Our Farmhouse Double IPA double dry hopped with Mosaic and conditioned on dried blueberries and hibiscus. 8.0%

beers.notes: Notes of lemon zest, pear, barnyard, hay, guava, chardonnay, and earth.
beers.description: Our Four-Grain Saison. 4.8% Batch #22. Brewed with rye, oats, wheat and Cascade hops. This is our most accurate interpretation of traditional Saison.
beers.summary:
Our Four-Grain Saison. 4.8% Batch #22. Brewed with rye, oats, wheat and Cascade hops. This is our most accurate interpretation of traditional Saison.
Notes of lemon zest, pear, barnyard, hay, guava, chardonnay, and earth.

beers.notes: Notes of tangelo, kiwi, dank, nectarine, honeysuckle, and grapefruit.
beers.description: Our American Pale Ale. 5.5% Brewed with oats. Hopped intensely with Simcoe, Centennial, and Amarillo. Hazy, juicy, and imminently crushable.
beers.summary:
Our American Pale Ale. 5.5% Brewed with oats. Hopped intensely with Simcoe, Centennial, and Amarillo. Hazy, juicy, and imminently crushable.
Notes of tangelo, kiwi, dank, nectarine, honeysuckle, and grapefruit.

beers.notes: Notes of maraschino cherries, awake minds coffee, blackcap raspberry, and cocoa powder.
beers.description: Zinfandel Grape Imperial Stout. 11.4% Brewed with oats and a plethora of specialty malts. Primary fermentation in stainless upon mountains of hand crushed Zinfandel grapes. The result is a complex and luscious reimagining of one of our most dark and devastating beers. No more hope. No more dawn. Only void.
beers.summary:
Zinfandel Grape Imperial Stout. 11.4% Brewed with oats and a plethora of specialty malts. Primary fermentation in stainless upon mountains of hand crushed Zinfandel grapes. The result is a complex and luscious reimagining of one of our most dark and devastating beers. No more hope. No more dawn. Only void.
Notes of maraschino cherries, awake minds coffee, blackcap raspberry, and cocoa powder.

beers.notes: Notes of bellini, Sauvignon Blanc Pet-Nat, graham cracker pie crust, and fall hay rides.
beers.description: Dry Hopped Peach Saison. 5.5% Blend of stainless and foudre conditioned saisons from our Dispensary. Conditioned on second use local peaches from our pal Ben Wenk at Three Springs Fruit Farm in Adams county. Thoughtfully dry hopped with Jeans hand selected Nelson Sauvin.
beers.summary:
Dry Hopped Peach Saison. 5.5% Blend of stainless and foudre conditioned saisons from our Dispensary. Conditioned on second use local peaches from our pal Ben Wenk at Three Springs Fruit Farm in Adams county. Thoughtfully dry hopped with Jeans hand selected Nelson Sauvin.
Notes of bellini, Sauvignon Blanc Pet-Nat, graham cracker pie crust, and fall hay rides.

beers.notes: Notes of mixed berry trifle, sweet tarts, lemonade tea, and rose.
beers.description: Triple Blended Saison. 7.2% One off blend made of three different oak conditioned saisons from our Dispensary. One thread conditioned on local Italian plums, another on sticky raspberries, and rounded out with a soft saison with lactose. We then conditioned the blend on vibrant Jasmine Tea, Tahitian and Madagascar vanilla beans.
beers.summary:
Triple Blended Saison. 7.2% One off blend made of three different oak conditioned saisons from our Dispensary. One thread conditioned on local Italian plums, another on sticky raspberries, and rounded out with a soft saison with lactose. We then conditioned the blend on vibrant Jasmine Tea, Tahitian and Madagascar vanilla beans.
Notes of mixed berry trifle, sweet tarts, lemonade tea, and rose.

beers.notes: Notes of blueberry scone, fresh linen, cranberry reduction, and brisk prosecco.
beers.description: Blueberry Brett Witbier. 6.0% A thoughtful blend of Carbonic macerated blueberry saison and witbier that was fermented with one of our favorite Belgian yeast strains along with our house brettanomyces culture harvested at our Dispensary.
beers.summary:
Blueberry Brett Witbier. 6.0% A thoughtful blend of Carbonic macerated blueberry saison and witbier that was fermented with one of our favorite Belgian yeast strains along with our house brettanomyces culture harvested at our Dispensary.
Notes of blueberry scone, fresh linen, cranberry reduction, and brisk prosecco.

beers.notes: Notes of tart cherry pie filling, fresh cut hay, meyer lemon flesh, and black tea leaf.
beers.description: Local Cherry Biere de Garde. 5.3% Brewed with pilsner malt and Belgian pale malt. Thoughtfully hopped in the kettle with French Strisselspalt and boiled for many hours. Fermented in an open top stainless tank with our magickal saison yeast and microflora from second use local tart and sweet cherries from our pal Ben Wenk at Three Springs Fruit Farm.
beers.summary:
Local Cherry Biere de Garde. 5.3% Brewed with pilsner malt and Belgian pale malt. Thoughtfully hopped in the kettle with French Strisselspalt and boiled for many hours. Fermented in an open top stainless tank with our magickal saison yeast and microflora from second use local tart and sweet cherries from our pal Ben Wenk at Three Springs Fruit Farm.
Notes of tart cherry pie filling, fresh cut hay, meyer lemon flesh, and black tea leaf.

beers.notes: Notes of orange creamsicle, citrus grove, vibrant sunbeams, and tropical smoothie.
beers.description: Calamansi Vanilla Berliner Weisse. 4.2% Brewed with heaps of malted oats. Primary fermentation with our house lactobacillus. Gently hopped in the kettle with German grown hops that Jean hand selected. Conditioned on luscious Calamansi puree and Tahitian Vanilla beans then Aggressively dry hopped with Mosaic.
beers.summary:
Calamansi Vanilla Berliner Weisse. 4.2% Brewed with heaps of malted oats. Primary fermentation with our house lactobacillus. Gently hopped in the kettle with German grown hops that Jean hand selected. Conditioned on luscious Calamansi puree and Tahitian Vanilla beans then Aggressively dry hopped with Mosaic.
Notes of orange creamsicle, citrus grove, vibrant sunbeams, and tropical smoothie.
